suggestions.original: To enhance the deformation dimension in the artwork, consider exaggerating the size and shape of the cup to match the whimsical and playful style of the rest of the piece. Additionally, you could further distort the proportions of the dog and its features, such as making the eyes or nose larger, to create a more cohesive and unified look. This will help ensure that all elements of the composition contribute equally to the overall artistic intention and emotional impact.
